name: Turret Architect
description: A Cookie Clicker type of game, where the Buildings actually exist in the 3d world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 560ti+ / AMD HD 7850+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 201 MB available space
